This article seeks to discuss Kenyon Martin Jr.âs fatherhood status and also provides his biography for fans to know more about him.

Kenyon Martin Jr. Biography.

Kenyon Lee Martin Jr., generally referred to as âKJâ, is a professional American basketball player who plays in the National Basketball Association (NBA) for the Los Angeles Clippers.

KJ was selected as the 52nd overall pick in Round 2 of the 2020 NBA Drafts by the Sacramento Kings.

However, he was traded to the Houston Rockets moments after his draft. After signing a 4-year contract with the Rockets, he stayed there for three years and was traded in 2023.

Kenyon Martin Jr. is currently at the Los Angeles Clippers after he was traded there on 8th July 2023.

Kenyon Martin Jr. children: Does Kenyon Martin Jr. have Kids?

Kenyon Martin Jr. is currently single and is yet to welcome a child of his own into the world.
